title: How to we repoet players with bought accounts?
body:
Ive encountered a few, so Im starting to take notes on there names now.
Now the proof that I have that there accounts are bought, is that they will have like a 75% win rate and be Gold 3+
Then, they would have dropped from diamond-Plat-Gold into Silver-Bronze.
with like 100+  losses under there pelt form there latest win.

EDIT: sorry for the title fuck up, my bad.

replies.body: its actually the modern day enigma code, simply the greatest algorithm anyone has ever put together, would you like your nobel prize delivered or would you like to take the time to accept in front of an audience of millions, be wary you will have to provide a speach
But dude, I spent like nearly a grand on this account wtf dont report pls
What a white knight. Truly blessed to have you on the job. Lmao you mad.
Having a high win rate doesn't mean you bought your account.
Why you wanna repoet them. Its their poets. Have some artistic integrity..
